function decode() { let response = java.get(baseUrl, {}); let content = String(response.body()); isPay = !/"content"/.test(content); if (isPay) { let accesskey = String(response.header("accesskey")); let keyString = String(response.header("keystring")); let accesskeyLen = accesskey.length; let v6 = accesskey.charCodeAt(accesskeyLen - 1); let v9 = 0; for (var i = 0; i < accesskey.length; i++) { v9 += accesskey.charCodeAt(i) } let v15 = v9 % keyString.length; let v17 = Math.floor(v9 / 65); let v18 = keyString.length; let v43 = keyString.substring(v15, v17 + v15 > v18 ? v18 : v17 + v15); let v32 = content.length; let [v38, dest] = (v6 & 1) !== 0 ? [content.slice(-12), content.slice(0, -12)] : [content.slice(0, 12), content.slice(12)]; let key = java.md5Encode(v43 + v38).slice(0, 8); let iv = java.md5Encode(v38).slice(0, 8); content = java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", key, iv).decryptStr(dest) } return content } extend = book.getVariable("custom"); if (!/versionCode/.test(baseUrl)) { content = java.getString("$.content"); upDown = java.getString("$.upDown"); saybody = java.getString("$.sayBody"); message = java.getString("$.message"); } else { if (/content/.test(result)) { java.setContent(result); } else { java.setContent(decode()); } content = java.getString("$..content"); if (String(content).length > 30) { content = java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", "KW8Dvm2N", "1ae2c94b").decryptStr(content); } else { content = ""; } upDown = java.getString("$..upDown"); saybody = java.getString("$..sayBody"); message = java.getString("$..message"); buy_ratio = java.getString("$..buy_ratio"); reader_buy_ratio = java.getString("$..reader_buy_ratio"); }; chapterintro = java.get("chapterintro"); pointMeassge = java.get("pointmeassge"); content1 = `\t${chapterintro}\n${message}`; if (pointMeassge != "0æ™‹æ±Ÿå¸") { content1 += "\nä»·æ ¼ï¼š" + pointMeassge + "ï¼ˆAPPä¸“äº«ä»·ï¼‰"; } if (/å…è´¹èµ é€çš„ç¦åˆ©ç•ªå¤–/.test(message)) { content1 += "\næœ¬ç¦åˆ©ç•ªå¤–èµ é€ç»™æ­£æ–‡è®¢é˜…ç‡è¾¾åˆ°" + buy_ratio + "çš„è¯»è€…\næ‚¨æˆªæ­¢è‡³ä¸Šä¸€ç« çš„æ­£æ–‡è®¢é˜…ç‡ï¼š" + reader_buy_ratio; } content = content != "" ? String(content).replace(/

|\n\n/g,"
‎
") : ""; saybody = replaceEmoticons(String(saybody)).replace(/src="(.*?)"/g,'src="$1,{"style":"TEXT"}"'); saybody = saybody != "" && (extend.includes("å¼€å¯ä½œè¯") || Map("saybodySwitch") !== "å…³é—­ä½œè¯") ? `\tâ–ä½œè€…æœ‰è¯è¯´ï¼š\n${saybody}` : ""; Content = content == "" ? content1 : (upDown == "0" ? `${saybody}\n‎\n${content}` : `${content}\n${saybody}`);
ruleContent.replaceRegex:
<js>
let bbb = String(book.getVariable("custom"));
let isParagraphEnabled = Map("paragraphSwitch");

let globalLimit = Map("paragraphLimit") || "20";
let globalSort = Map("paragraphSort") || "0";
let versionCode = Map("versionCode");

if (!isParagraphEnabled && /å¼€å¯[â€¢Â·]?æ®µè¯„/.test(bbb)) {
	bbb = bbb.replace(/å¼€å¯[â€¢Â·]?æ®µè¯„/g, '').trim();
	book.putCustomVariable(bbb);
	java.toast("âš ï¸ å…¨å±€æ®µè¯„å·²å…³é—­ï¼Œå·²æ¸…é™¤æœ¬ä¹¦çš„æ®µè¯„å¼€å¯æ ‡è®°");
}

try {
	if (!/å…³é—­æœ¬ä¹¦æ®µè¯„/.test(bbb)) {
		let shouldShowParagraph = false;
		if (isParagraphEnabled || /å¼€å¯.?æ®µè¯„/.test(bbb)) {
			shouldShowParagraph = true;
			if (!/å¼€å¯â€¢æ®µè¯„/.test(bbb)) {
				baseUrl = bDe(baseUrl);
				cid = baseUrl.match(/chapterId=(\d+)/)[1];
				nid = baseUrl.match(/novelId=(\d+)/)[1];

				let checkurl = `https://android.jjwxc.com/app.jjwxc/android/reading/authorNovelSetting/getSetting?versionCode=${versionCode}&novelid=${nid}&setting_type=author_paragraph_comment_switch,{"headers":{"versionCode":"${versionCode}"}}`;
				let checkparagraph = JSON.parse(java.ajax(checkurl))?.data?.paragraph_switch;

				if (checkparagraph === "1") {
					book.putCustomVariable(/å¼€å¯æ®µè¯„/.test(bbb) ? bbb.replace(/å¼€å¯æ®µè¯„/, "å¼€å¯â€¢æ®µè¯„") : bbb + "\nå¼€å¯â€¢æ®µè¯„");
					java.toast("æœ¬ä¹¦ä½œè€…å·²å¼€å¯æ®µè¯„åŠŸèƒ½");
				} else if (checkparagraph === "0") {
					book.putCustomVariable(/å¼€å¯æ®µè¯„/.test(bbb) ? bbb.replace(/å¼€å¯æ®µè¯„/, "å…³é—­æœ¬ä¹¦æ®µè¯„") : bbb + "\nå…³é—­æœ¬ä¹¦æ®µè¯„");
					java.toast("æœ¬ä¹¦ä½œè€…æ²¡æœ‰å¼€å¯æ®µè¯„åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œå·²è‡ªåŠ¨åœ¨ã€ä¹¦ç±å˜é‡ã€‘ä¸­å…³é—­æ®µè¯„");
					shouldShowParagraph = false;
				}
			}

			if (shouldShowParagraph) {
				baseUrl = bDe(baseUrl);
				cid = baseUrl.match(/chapterId=(\d+)/)[1];
				nid = baseUrl.match(/novelId=(\d+)/)[1];
				let getNovelParagraph = `https://android.jjwxc.com/app.jjwxc/android/reading/comment/getNovelParagraphCommentNum?versionCode=${versionCode}&novelid=${nid}&token=${Map("token")}&chapterid=${cid}&limit=${globalLimit}&sort=${globalSort},{"headers":{"versionCode":"${versionCode}"}}`;

				let $ = JSON.parse(java.ajax(getNovelParagraph));
				let datalength = $.data.length;

				if (datalength) {
					let pid = 1;
					let jsonData = $.data;
					let list = result.split("\n");
					let processedList = "";

					for (i in list) {
						let item = list[i];
						if (/^[\sã€€]*[\u200B-\u200F\u202A-\u202E\uFEFF]?[\sã€€]*$/.test(item) || /^\s*$/.test(item)) {
							processedList += "\n" + item + "\n";
						} else {
							let matchedPara = jsonData.find(p => p.paragraph_id === String(pid) || (String(p.paragraph_id) === "-2" && /ä½œè€…æœ‰è¯è¯´/.test(item)));
							if (matchedPara) {
								processedList += `${item}${getImage(matchedPara.comment_total,matchedPara.paragraph_id)}\n`;
							} else {
								processedList += item + "\n";
							}
							pid++;
						}
					}
					result = processedList;
				}
			}
		}
	}
} catch (e) {
	java.log("æ®µè¯„å¤„ç†é”™è¯¯: " + e);
}
result
</js>

if (chaptertype == "0") {
	chaptername = String(name).replace(/[ã€]?ç¬¬\s?\d+\s?ç« [ã€‘]?\s*|[ç¬¬]?[ã€‡é›¶ä¸€äºŒä¸‰å››äº”å…­ä¸ƒå…«ä¹åç™¾åƒä¸‡ä¸¤â–¡]+ç« \s*|(?=^)\d+(?=$)|ç¦åˆ©ç•ªå¤–/g, "");
	chaptername = `${isvip}ç¬¬${chapterid}ç«  ${chaptername}${chaptername == "" ? chapterMessage : " " + chapterMessage}${chaptername == "" ? islock : " " + islock}`;
} else {
	volumename = `ğŸ“œ${name}`;
}
</js>

} else {

};

bookSourceComment: åœ¨ã€æ­£æ–‡é¡µé¢ã€‘ç‚¹å‡»å®šåˆ¶æŒ‰é’®å¯ä»¥åŠ å…¥ä¹¦æ¶ åœ¨ã€ç™»å½•ã€‘è¾“å…¥tokenå³å¯ç™»é™†æŸ¥çœ‹æ”¶è—çš„ä½œè€…ï¼› åœ¨ã€ä¹¦ç±å˜é‡ã€‘é‡Œè¾“å…¥1ï¼Œå¼€å¯ä¹¦ç±è¯„è®ºï¼ˆé»˜è®¤å…³é—­ï¼‰ ç›®å½• æ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´ï¼ˆä¸ç”¨çš„ä»£ç ï¼‰ï¼š[-](?=[一-龥]) æ­£æ–‡ï¼šA = ''+" "+novelTags+" "+mainview+" "+protagonist+" "+costar+" "+other+" "+novelIntroShort+" "+novelIntro1+" "+commentcount+" "+novelbefavoritedcount+" ‎ "+novelIntro+" ‎ "+"ã€"+novelId+"ã€‘"+" "+"ã€"+codeUrl+"ã€‘"

ruleContent.content:
<js>
islock = java.getString("$.islock");
if(islock == "0") {
	// ç®€ä»‹
	novelStep = java.getString("$.novelStep");
	novelStatus = novelStep == "0" ? "æš‚åœ" : (novelStep == "1" ? "è¿è½½" : "å®Œç»“");
	novelClass = java.getString("$.novelClass");
	novelTags = String(java.getString("$.novelTags")).replace(/^(?=\S)|,(?=\S)/g,"ğŸ·ï¸");
	mainview = "è§†è§’ï¼š"+java.getString("$.mainview");
	protagonist = String(java.getString("$.protagonist"));
	costar = String(java.getString("$.costar"));
	other= String(java.getString("$.other"));
	novelIntroShort = "ä¸€å¥è¯ç®€ä»‹ï¼š"+java.getString("$.novelIntroShort");
	littleintro = String(java.getString("$.novelIntro"));
	littleintro = littleintro.replace(/ç«‹æ„\:/,"ç«‹æ„ï¼š");
	littleintro = /ç«‹æ„ï¼š/.test(littleintro) ? littleintro.replace(/.*(ç«‹æ„ï¼š.*)/,"$1") : "";
	comment_count = "è¯„è®ºï¼š"+String(java.getString("$.comment_count")).replace(/\,/g,"");
	novelbefavoritedcount = "æ”¶è—ï¼š"+java.getString("$.novelbefavoritedcount");
	nutrition_novel = "çŒæº‰ï¼š"+java.getString("$.nutrition_novel");
	novelIntro = String(java.getString("$.novelIntro")).replace(/ç«‹æ„\:.*$/,"");
	novelId = String(java.getString("$.novelId"));
	A =  novelClass+"ã€€"+novelStatus+"\n"+novelTags+"\n"+mainview+"\n"+protagonist+"\n"+costar+"\n"+other+"\n"+novelIntroShort+"\n"+littleintro+"\n"+comment_count+"\n"+novelbefavoritedcount+"\n"+nutrition_novel+"\n‎\n"+novelIntro;

	// è¯„è®º
	extend = book.getVariable("custom");
	commenturl = "https://s8-static.jjwxc.net/comment_json.php?novelid="+String(novelId);
	commentall = /1/.test(extend) ? JSON.parse(java.ajax(commenturl)) : "";
	cstate = commentall.state;
	
	if (cstate == "200") {
		cbody = commentall.body;
		commentL = cbody.map(P => {
			let { foldlingauthor, commentbody, chapterid: pchapterid, vip_chapter_icon, subscriptionicon, ip_pos, commentdate } = P;
			return `â€¢â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€¢â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€¢\n@${foldlingauthor}ã€€${subscriptionicon}ã€€æ‰€è¯„ç« èŠ‚ï¼š${pchapterid}${vip_chapter_icon}\n${commentbody}\næ¥è‡ª${ip_pos}ã€€å‘è¡¨æ—¶é—´ï¼š${commentdate}\n`;
			}).join("");
			} else {
			commentL = commentall.message;
			}
			A = commentL ? `${A}\n‎\n${commentL}` : A;
	} else {
	message = java.getString("$.message");
	}
</js>
